resources.string: Important Update: We will be discontinuing the separate Authenticator app on %1$s
For 2FA tokens for your vault items, they are accessible in the tools section of this app under Authenticator.\nIf you have the Dashlane 2FA token stored in Dashlane Authenticator, please see below:
Disable 2FA from your Dashlane security settings from your mobile app or Dashlane web extension
Install a new Authenticator App (e.g., Google Authenticator)
Reconfigure 2FA for your Dashlane account from your security settings on the Dashlane web extension
